data.name: Incubation
data.value: Cyberport Incubation Programme

data.name: Step_1_Profile
data.value: YOUR PROFILE AND ELIGIBILITY

data.name: Step_1_Q2
data.value: Do you have a viable business plan for a product or service to be ready for marketing in 12 to 18 months?

data.name: Step_1_Q3
data.value: Do the founder(s) of the Applicant collectively (legally and beneficially) hold at least 51% of the company shares or absolute control of the Applicant at the time of application submission and throughout the Programme Period?

data.name: Step_1_Q4
data.value: Are you presently a registered digital tech company limited by shares (or in progress of incorporation) under the Companies Ordinance in HKSAR with date of incorporation less than 7 years upon application deadline? (Please upload your Certificate of Incorporation (CI) or receipt of application under Section 5.1. In any case of pending for incorporation in Companies Registry, the process should be completed within 30 calendar days after the application deadline)

data.name: Step_1_Q5
data.value:
You have read Cyberport Incubation Programme Guides and Notes for the Applicants (ENC.RF.010) and confirmed that a principal applicant working for the applicant cannot be a founder, co-founder or director who is working for any of the following:
(i) A company in the same nature currently in any incubation programme(s) operated by Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company, Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation, or Hong Kong Design Centre (together the “HK Incubators”); or
(ii) A company in the same nature that has previously joined and graduated from any incubation programme operated by any of the HK Incubators

data.name: Step_1_Q6
data.value: Have your proposed project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for or received any grant or funding from any publicly and / or privately funded organizations/ programmes in the past 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 2.3.2.3 below.

data.name: Step_1_Q7
data.value: Is your proposed project or your other similar digital tech projects applying for, or does your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) anticipates to receiving or to becoming entitled to receive any grant or funding from any publicly and / or privately-funded organizations or programmes in the coming 18 months? If “Yes”, please list out in details in Section 2.3.2.3 below.

data.name: Step_1_Q8
data.value: Are you aware of any existing relationships or situations that might cause the potential for an actual or perceived conflict of interest? If “Yes”, please provide details in Section 2.3.2.4.

data.name: Step_1_Q9
data.value: Please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in Section 2.3.2.4 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à- vis the previous one

data.name: Step_1_Q10
data.value: Please state whether this application is a re-submission of a previously-submitted application to the programme(s) of Cyberport, and / or other publicly-administered funding schemes. If yes, please set out the project reference of the previous application in Section 2.3.2.4 and highlight the main differences of this application vis-à- vis the previous one.

data.name: Step2_COMPANY_INFORMATION
data.value: COMPANY INFORMATION

data.name: Step_1_Q1
data.value: Is your idea rooted in digital tech related areas?

data.name: Step2_Company_Name
data.value: Company Name

data.name: Instruction_1
data.value: To observe the following requirements when filling in the application:

data.name: Instruction_1_1
data.value: Use <mark>English</mark> to complete the application unless otherwise specified;

data.name: Instruction_1_2
data.value: Present all monetary figures in <mark>Hong Kong Dollar;</mark>

data.name: Instruction_1_3
data.value: Use <mark>Traditional Chinese characters</mark> for Chinese information;

data.name: Instruction_1_4
data.value: Put <mark>“NA”</mark> where the information sought is not applicable or not available;

data.name: Instruction_2
data.value: To read the Cyberport Incubation Programme Guides and Notes for the Applicants (ENC.RF.010) before filling in this Application Form.

data.name: Instruction_3
data.value: The form must be completed by the applicant. If the applicant is a company, the form must be completed by the director or owner of the applicant organisation. Otherwise it will not be processed.

data.name: Instruction_4
data.value: To submit <mark class="mark-2"><u>1 online application associated with 1 email account is required in applying Cyberport Incubation Programme</u></mark>

data.name: Instruction_4_1
data.value:
For enquiries, please email to cip_enquiry@cyberport.hk.

Please prepare and upload the requested supporting documents including but not limited to the following if applicable:
  • Company documents (e.g. Business Registration, Certificate of Incorporation, etc.)
  • Identity documents (e.g. copy of Hong Kong Identity Card, Passport, etc.)
  • Other supplementary information such as Corporate Structure / Organisation Chart, Curriculum Vitae of team members, pictures, diagrams and business proposal etc. for illustration of your project (if any)


You are recommended to prepare a 1-minute video clip/presentation file/slide show to illustrate your project if applicable. Kindly provide the link in Section 5.3, if there is any.

data.name: Step_2_Abstract
data.value: Abstract

data.name: Step_2_Revenue_model
data.value: Revenue Model / Revenue Plan

data.name: Step_2_Business_model
data.value: Business Performance Milestones set for every six months during the entire incubation period.

data.name: Step2_Heading
data.value: YOUR PROFILE AND ELIGIBILITY

data.name: Instruction_5
data.value: For enquiries, please email to <mark class="mark-2">cip_enquiry@cyberport.hk.</mark>

data.name: Instruction_6
data.value: Remarks: This application form has been translated into Chinese for reference only. In case of discrepancy, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Step_5_agree
data.value: I agree to receive direct marketing information.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration1
data.value: We agree with all the terms and conditions set out in the Cyberport Incubation Programme Guides and Notes for the Applicants (ENC.RF.010) governing the application of the Cyberport Incubation Programme

data.name: Step_5_Declaration2
data.value: All information provided in this application as well as the accompanying information is true, not misleading in any manner and reflects the status of affairs as at the date of submission. I shall inform the Administration of the Cyberport Incubation Programme immediately if there are any changes to the above information.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration3
data.value: We are the creators of our proposed project the details of which have been described in Section 2.4.1 of this Cyberport Incubation Programme Application Form ("Project") and our Project is original. To the best of our knowledge, the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project are not under development or available anywhere in the world.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration4
data.value: The development, completion and use of the Project and the product(s) and/or service(s) to be developed as a part of the Project will not infringe the rights or intellectual property rights of any other party (whether registered or not), including but not limited to patent rights, trade mark rights, and copyright.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration5
data.value: Other than the funding programme(s) specified in Section 2.3.2.3 of this Application Form, we (whether individually or as part of any team) have not applied for or received any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the past 18 months and we are not applying for nor will we be entitled to receive any other grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project in the future 18 months. We will notify Cyberport immediately if we apply for or become entitled to any grant or funding from any publicly and/or privately funded organisations/programmes for the Project and when requested, provide evidence of payments made or received in respect of such programmes.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration6
data.value: We will use any grant or financial assistance to be received from the Cyberport Incubation Programme (if any) for the sole purpose of developing and completing the Project. We will not give away, share or otherwise use any grant or financial assistance to be received from the Cyberport Incubation Programme in contravention of the law or any of the terms which apply to application for funding from the Cyberport Incubation Programme

data.name: Step_5_have_read
data.value: In consideration of HKCMCL considering and processing our application for funding from Cyberport Incubation Programme, we confirm our agreement and undertake the following by checking this box

data.name: Step_5_Personal_Information
data.value: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT

data.name: Step_5_visit
data.value: Please visit our website http://www.cyberport.hk/en/pics for the Personal Information Collection Statement of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited.

data.name: tep_2_Production
data.value: Production / post-production

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION
data.value: PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTION STATEMENT

data.name: Step_6_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_1
data.value: This Personal Information Collection Statement of Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited ("us" or "we") applies to the personal data collected in this Cyberport Incubation Programme Application Form ("Personal Data").

data.name: step_6_personal_information_collection
data.value: l have read the Personal Information Collection Statement above.

data.name: Step_6_Privacy
data.value: Our Privacy Policy and Practices

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_1
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at

data.name: Step_6_Privacy_2
data.value: Please see our Privacy Policy Statement at http://www.cyberport.hk/en/privacy_policy for our general policy and practices in respect of our collection and use of personal data.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose
data.value: Purpose and Use of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_1
data.value: The Personal Data will be used for one or more of the following purposes:

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_2
data.value: processing your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_3
data.value: communicating with you if we have any/or question and update about your application;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_4
data.value: providing updates, services, products, facilities or activities and matters relating to our administration, management, operation and maintenance;

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_5
data.value: designing, reviewing, evaluating and enhancing our services, products, facilities or activities (including conducting research, survey and analysis for those purposes);

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_6
data.value: direct marketing (please see "Direct Marketing" section below); and

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_7
data.value: handling complaints, legal, safety and security purposes.

data.name: Step_6_Purpose_8
data.value: It is mandatory to provide the requested personal data, or we will not be able to process your application.

data.name: STEP_6_STATEMENT
data.value: This Statement is written in the English language and may be translated into other languages. In the event of any inconsistency between the English version and the translated version of this Statement, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Step_6_Title_Principal_Applicant
data.value: Position Title of Principal Applicant

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data
data.value: Transfer of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_1
data.value: Your Data will not generally be disclosed or transferred to any other party in a form that would identify you, except in the following circumstances:

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_2
data.value: If we use third party suppliers or service providers who provide services to support our business operation or facilitate provision of our services, products, facilities or activities, we may provide Your Data to these suppliers or service providers.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_3
data.value: We may disclose Your Data to any governmental or law enforcement agency, judicial body or regulatory authority to whom we are required to make disclosure according to any law, regulation, court order, direction, code or guideline.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_4
data.value: In addition, Your Data may be accessed by, disclosed or transferred to any person under a duty of confidentiality to us (including our accountants, auditors, legal advisers or other professional advisers) for the purposes described in the "Purpose and Use of Your Data" section above.

data.name: BRCOPY
data.value: Certificate of Incorporation / Receipt of Application (if you are in process of company incorporation)

data.name: CompanyAnnualReturn
data.value: Company Annual Return

data.name: File_size
data.value: File size is limited to 5MB

data.name: File_type
data.value: File type is limited to PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, PNG, JPG, GIF

data.name: File_type_presntation
data.value: File type is limited to PDF, PPT, PPTX, PNG, JPG, GIF

data.name: OtherAttachment
data.value: Other Attachment

data.name: Step_6_Access
data.value: Access to and Correction of Your Data

data.name: Step_6_Access_1
data.value: You have the right to request access to, and correction of, Your Data held by us. We may charge a reasonable fee for administering and processing your data access request. If you need to check whether we hold Your Data or if you wish to have access to, correct any of Your Data which is inaccurate, please write via e-mail to our Data Protection Officer at dpo@cyberport.hk or via mail to Level 6, Cyberport 2, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_1
data.value: means the community or development located at Telegraph Bay, Pokfulam including its offices, centres and arcade.

data.name: Step_6_cyberport_2
data.value: We cannot use Your Data for direct marketing unless we have received your consent or indication of no objection. You may write to our Data Protection Officer or contact us via the contact information provided in our direct marketing materials to opt out from direct marketing at any time.

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing
data.value: Direct Marketing

data.name: Step_6_Direct_marketing_1
data.value: In connection with direct marketing, we intend to use your name and email address to market and promote the services, products, facilities, activities, contests, conferences, lucky draws, events and promotional campaigns from time to time available relating to us or "Cyberport", or shops or merchants or hotel in the "Cyberport" or offered or hosted at "Cyberport" (including consumer goods, food and beverages, books and stationery, children goods and services, fashion and accessories, optical products, watches, jewellery, luxurious goods, personal care, health and beauty products and services, furniture and lifestyle goods, home furnishing and appliances, florists, sports gear and products, electronic products and appliances, banking and financial services, cinemas and theatres, cultural, entertainment facilities and activities, charity activities, leisure activities and performances, gift redemptions and car parking facilities)

data.name: step_6_marketing
data.value: I agree to receive direct marketing information.

data.value:
Video Clip

(Recommended item)

data.name: intruction_you_are
data.value: You are required:

data.name: PresentationSlide
data.value:
Presentation Slide

(Recommended item)

data.name: Step_2_Off_site_incubation
data.value: Off-site incubation

data.name: Step_2_On_site_incubation
data.value: On-site incubation

data.name: ATTACHMENT_Title
data.value: ATTACHMENT

data.name: Step_2_5_5_Note
data.value: Note: On-site incubatee should maintain a reasonable level of utilisation of the office space allocated on a regular basis. If the monthly utilisation rate is lower than 50% in any 3 months during the term, the use of allocated office space will be terminated. Office space will be allocated subject to availability.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration7
data.value: We understand the information provided in this application will be disclosed to authorised Cyberport staff and vetting team for screening and vetting purposes. No Confidential Agreement of any kind will be signed with Cyberport or the authorised Cyberport staff and vetting members on any occasion.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration8
data.value: We give our consent to authorised Cyberport staff to carry out necessary due diligence/reference check for the purpose of assessing this application.

data.name: Step_5_Declaration9
data.value: We acknowledge that HKCMCL has absolute discretion to revoke this application and call for refund of the full amount of grant or financial assistance received by the applicant if any member of the team breaches any of the terms and conditions in the Cyberport Incubation Programme Guides and Notes for the Applicants (ENC.RF.010), this Cyberport Incubation Programme Application Form and any other relevant agreement(s) between us and HKCMCL. If any of our conduct amounts to or may amount to a breach of criminal law, HKCMCL would report our conduct to the relevant law enforcement body.

data.name: Step_6_Transfer_data_note
data.value: As the parties mentioned above may be located outside Hong Kong, Your Data may be transferred out of Hong Kong.

data.name: Question_1_1_Note
data.value: Note 1.1 You are not eligible to submit: Projects must be rooted in digital tech related areas.

data.name: Question_1_1_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.1 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_2_Note
data.value: Note 1.2 You are not eligible to submit: The applicant should have a viable business plan for a product or service to be ready for marketing in 12 to 18 months.

data.name: Question_1_2_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.2 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_3_Note
data.value: Note 1.3 You are not eligible to submit: The applicant should collectively (legally and beneficially) hold at least 51% of the company shares or absolute control of the Applicant at the time of application submission and throughout the Programme Period.

data.name: Question_1_3_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.3 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_4_Note
data.value: Note 1.4 You are not eligible to submit: The applicant must be a digital tech company registered and incorporated (or in progress of incorporation) in HKSAR less than 7 years upon application deadline.

data.name: Question_1_4_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.4 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Question_1_5_Note
data.value: Note 1.5 You are not eligible to submit: A principal applicant working for the applicant cannot be a founder, co-founder or director who is working for any of the following: a company in the same nature currently in any incubation programme(s) operated by Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company, Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation, or Hong Kong Design Centre (together the “HK Incubators”); or a company in the same nature that has previously joined and graduated from any incubation programme operated by any of the HK Incubators.

data.name: Question_1_5_SubmitError
data.value: Question 1.5 Must select "Yes" to qualify for submission.

data.name: Declaration_Title
data.value: DECLARATION

data.name: CI_Reminder

data.name: Question_1_8_1
data.value: Please select yes / no in the required field: Question 1.9

data.name: Step_1_Q8_1
data.value: Have your project or your other similar digital tech project(s) applied for the Cyberport Creative Micro Funds (CCMF) in the same intake? If “Yes”, Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited (HKCMCL) shall only consider your application of Cyberport Incubation Programme for this intake without further notice.
